name: SpongeBob: Get Cooking
storyline:
Fire up the grill! Delight customers by serving up delicious dishes in Bikini Bottom's restaurants in this culinary adventure based on the series.

When Mr. Krabs realizes there’s more money to be earned in the fast-food business, the penny-pinching restaurateur sets out to expand his empire — starting with a breakfast stand outside of SpongeBob’s house. Who better to help Mr. Krabs run his business than SpongeBob SquarePants himself?

Play as SpongeBob to create your own Bikini Bottom kitchen, decorate and customize your restaurant, and get ready to serve your guests delicious food! In this fast-food cooking game, put your time-management skills to the test and experience an expanded SpongeBob universe.
summary:
Play as SpongeBob to create your own Bikini Bottom kitchen, decorate and customize your restaurant, and get ready to serve your guests delicious food! In this fast-food cooking game, put your time-management skills to the test and experience an expanded SpongeBob universe.

Available exclusively for Netflix members.
